- Framework: Next.js 15 (App Router)
- Language: TypeScript 5.0
- Database: PostgreSQL + Prisma ORM
- Authentication: Supabase Auth
- Styling: Tailwind CSS
- Validation: Zod
- Security: Rate limiting, input validation, CORS, security headers
